mapper.insert: insert into reservation_tbl (rsNum, user_id, isbn13, rsStartDay, rsEndDay) values (#{rsNum}, #{user_id}, #{isbn13}, #{rsStartDay}, #{rsEndDay})
mapper.update: update reservation_tbl set user_id = #{user_id}, isbn13 = #{isbn13}, rsNum = #{rsNum}, rsStartDay = #{rsStartDay}, rsEndDay = sysdate where rsNum = #{rsNum} and isbn13 = #{isbn13}
mapper.delete: delete from reservation_tbl where rsNum = #{rsNum} and isbn13 = #{isbn13}
